verbs.description: Rep. Frank Pallone Jr. [V: was] chosen to deliver the weekly Democratic response to President Donald Trump .
[ARG1: Rep. Frank Pallone Jr.] was [V: chosen] [ARG4: to deliver the weekly Democratic response to President Donald Trump] .
[ARG0: Rep. Frank Pallone Jr.] was chosen to [V: deliver] [ARG1: the weekly Democratic response] [ARG2: to President Donald Trump] .
